sum_fieldave.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =================================
00002 !
00003 !    1D gather for time-averaged electric fields
00004 !
00005 !  =================================
00006 
00007 subroutine sum_fieldave
00008 
00009   use physvars
00010   use treevars
00011   implicit none
00012   include 'mpif.h'
00013 
00014 
00015   real :: dx, x_start, x_stop
00016   real :: fr1, fr2, ra, gamma, xt, yt, zt, rt
00017   real :: ttrav, tfetch
00018   integer :: ndum, i, j, k, ng, i1, i2, nelecs, nions, ngr, icall, ierr, p
00019   character(30) :: cfile
00020   character(5) :: cme
00021   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00022 
00023   real*8, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: ex_g, ey_g, ez_g, phi_g, w_g
00024   integer, dimension(ngx+1) :: pshortl
00025 
00026 
00027   if (my_rank==0) then
00028      write(*,'(//a/a,f10.2)') '1D field average '
00029 !          ' fields on grid 0-',xl
00030   endif
00031 
00032   !  field box limits 
00033 !  x_start = -xl/2 ! TODO: User should supply these limits
00034   x_start = x_offset ! TODO: User should supply these limits
00035   x_stop = xl
00036 
00037   dx = (x_stop-x_start)/ngx
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 ! Axial electric field - set up dummy particles at grid points & find forces directly from tree
00042 ! Dummies set up at end of particle arrays on root to ensure unique labelling
00043 
00044   if (my_rank==0) then
00045       do i=1,ngx+1
00046         
00047         p = npp+i   !index
00048         pshortl(i) = p   !index
00049         x(p) = (i-1)*dx + x_start   ! axial position in box
00050         y(p) = plasma_centre(2)  ! target centre
00051         z(p) = plasma_centre(3)
00052       end do
00053 
00054 ! Get interaction lists
00055 !     write (*,*) 'Doing lists for dummy particles'
00056 !     write (*,'((i8,f12.3))') (pshortl(i),x(pshortl(i)),i=1,ngx+1)
00057      ndum = ngx+1
00058    else
00059      ndum=0  ! Remainder of CPUs just have to provide multipole info      
00060    endif  
00061 
00062 ! all CPUs must call walk
00063 
00064    call tree_walk(pshortl(1:ndum),ndum,1,theta,eps,itime,mac,ttrav,tfetch)
00065 
00066    if (my_rank==0) then
00067 ! Fields
00068      do i=1,ngx+1
00069         p=pshortl(i)
00070         call sum_force(p, nterm(i), nodelist( 1:nterm(i),i), eps, &
00071              ex_g(i-1), ey_g(i-1), ez_g(i-1), phi_g(i-1), w_g(i-1))
00072      end do
00073  
00074      ex_ave = ex_ave + force_const*Ex_g/navcycle    ! Accumulate axial field
00075   endif
00076 
00077 
00078 end subroutine sum_fieldave
00079
